files.tests.test_logic module

class files.tests.test_logic.IndianaTestCase(methodName='runTest')[source]

Bases: TestCase

A test case for validating the functionality of the Indiana class.

setUp()[source]

Set up a temporary directory and file for testing.

Initializes an instance of the Indiana class with the temporary directory as its search path and prepares a GeneralResearcher instance for supplementary operations.

tearDown()[source]

Clean up the temporary directory and any generated files after tests complete.

test_find_loot()[source]

Test the find_loot method to ensure it discovers files in the specified directory.

test_save_results()[source]

Test the save_results method to ensure it writes the discovered files data to a CSV file.

Verifies the existence of the output CSV file after the save_results method is called.
